name: Hazeel Cult
Start point: Ceril Carnillean in the Carnillean Mansion, west Ardougne.
Description: Ceril Carnillean suspects his brother, Clivet, is involved in a cult trying to resurrect the ancient Mahjarrat Hazeel. He asks for your help investigating Clivet's activities in the sewers below. You must choose whether to help Ceril stop the cult or aid Clivet in bringing Hazeel back.
Recommended: Combat level sufficient to defeat a level 13 enemy (if siding with Ceril)
Rewards: Siding with Clivet: Hazeel mark, 1,000 Thieving experience

substeps: Talk to Ceril Carnillean on the ground floor[UK]1st floor[US] of the Carnillean Mansion in west Ardougne.
Agree to investigate his brother Clivet's activities

Walkthrough.step: Meeting Clivet and Choosing a Side
substeps: Find cave entrance south of mansion marked by dungeon icon
Talk to Clivet in the sewer cave
Choose to help Clivet (cult) or refuse to help (side with Ceril)
Poison Carnillean family's food in mansion basement
Retrieve Hazeel's scroll from mansion using Hazeel mark
Set sewer valves to flood cult chamber (1 left, 4 right)
Expose corrupt butler by finding poison evidence
Return to quest giver for reward
Gain access to Ardougne Rat Pits
